Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: FLDonna
Reviews.Content: Don't let the price fool you these are nice high quality wide-angle cameras.  The cameras I bought were 3.6mm.  They capture my entire front yard and the night vision is excellent.  I replaced older cameras, and these cost much less than my original cameras and are MUCH better.  I have bought several cameras from this seller and I've been happy with all of them.

Reviews.Title: CCTV camera
Reviews.Author: A. Pena
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price clear color picture during daylight night vision fuzzy and one camera night vision failed after 6 months. Not worth the money if you are using in poor lite.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera's, but..
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I bought these cameras to use in the house. In daylight mode the picture is kinda blurry and there is no adjustment for focusing. Night vision actually looks better then daylight mode, but is still blurry. These cameras are better then my 420 tv line cameras though. Also, these camera's are not wide angle cameras. There is no fish eye look to the image. It has a normal range of view.

Reviews.Title: Good quality.
Reviews.Author: N. Howell "computer geek"
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  The cameras work great.  I have them outside and the infra red night vision is outstanding! All in all it's exactly what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Elhawa
Reviews.Content: this camera is nice at day time when it is light  but night time camera doesn't work in the dark

Reviews.Title: It does what's needed
Reviews.Author: Dave the Pear
Reviews.Content: The camera is lightweight and well constructed. The "fish eye" lens is rather weird but I needed a wide angle lens. It hooked up to their DVR with no problems. I almost forgot how easy it is to set up a non-network camera. It hasn't rained yet, so I don't know how weatherproof it is...

ProductInfo.Features:
Aluminum housing with metal bracket. Lens: 6.0mm. 520 TV lines high resolution
Built in with dual-filter day & night auto switching
Adjustable swivel mount, can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
36 built-in IR illuminators for night vision
Package included: 2 x CMOS infrared cameras and 2 x 12V DC 500mA power supplies
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Outdoor CCTV Infrared Day Night Vision Bullet Security Cameras Weatherproof 520TVL High Resolution 36 IR LEDs for DVR Home Surveillance with Power Supplies WK8
